name: Emoji Planet
description:
Some planets are way out of whack. Load them up with other emotions to balance them out in this Pokemon-like RPG. Arrow keys to move and space bar to select, also works with mouse. Sorry it's a bit janky! Our programmer just got his wisdom teeth out hahaha

Design & Art: Katherine Elliott

Design & Programming: Raphael Tetreault

This game's looks reference the game jam that where Raph and I first met. We thought it would be a good fit for "Again, with Feeling" because this time we have feelings for each other ♥️ Special thanks to the rest of the team that made Growing Planets; Devin Murray, Meagan Byrne, and Elana Cincinatus.
